content.question: The location of the Lanzón Stela in the Old Temple of Chavín de Huántar suggests that the creators of the building most likely intended to

choices.label: facilitate pilgrims’ circumambulation of the stela during annual processions
heighten the spiritual drama of the viewer’s ritualized encounter with the stela
maximize the stela’s exposure to the rising sun on the winter solstice
enhance visibility of the stela for the audiences during coronation

content.answer: heighten the spiritual drama of the viewer’s ritualized encounter with the stela

topic.text: 5.3: Purpose and Audience in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
